en.today: Your intuition rewires itself throughout the coming months, dear Aries, as Jupiter stations retrograde. Your connection with family and the values that your home life revolves around also come under review, and it'll be essential to address how your personal philosophies and emotions are evolving. These vibes are perfect for honoring your roots while continuing on the path of transformation. A desire to update your space may emerge, but you'll want to thoroughly assess projects before taking them on. Avoid feeding into power struggles, obsessions, jealousy, or suspicions later tonight when the Leo quarter Moon stirs up friction.

en.today: Your inner philosopher will be highly active throughout the coming months, darling Leo, as Jupiter stations retrograde. Expect your psychic abilities to shift during this time, and consider implementing a more consistent spiritual practice to master the intuition. Take note of your dreams, and if they offer valuable insights. This planetary backspin can also be helpful for correcting behaviors and working toward healthier cycles. Solitude and peace will be particularly beneficial, but notice if you start to feel isolated. The quarter Moon rises in your sign later tonight, stirring up complicated emotions, fragile egos, and intensifying bonds.

en.today: Return to basics before pursuing additional knowledge, dearest Taurus, as Jupiter stations retrograde in your solar third house. Wisdom can be gained when you place value in simple lessons, and new details will emerge. This planetary backspin lasts until March 10, 2026, giving you plenty of opportunities to retrace steps and uncover fresh discoveries. If you've been considering going back to school, now is a good time to make solid plans. Tension could brew at home once the Leo quarter Moon rises tonight, especially if you or loved ones have felt neglected. Lead with passion without burying your own needs.

en.today: Your financial situation ebbs and flows throughout the next four months, dear Gemini, as Jupiter stations retrograde. Be extra kind to your bank account, and hold off on major purchases. If there's a significant expense in your future, use this energy to save up. Your sense of personal value also comes into focus, and it'll be essential to recognize if you have a habit of selling yourself short. Spending time with nature and curbing materialistic tendencies will bring rewards to your life. The quarter Moon rises in Leo later tonight, intensifying mental or physical burnout if you haven't been taking care of yourself.
